metadata.title: CVE-2023-39593 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Insecure permissions in the sys_exec function of MariaDB v10.5 allowsauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary commands with elevatedprivileges. NOTE: this is disputed by the MariaDB Foundation because noprivilege boundary is crossed.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.6 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
